CCR.name: Creedence Clearwater Revival
CCR.description: The greatest band to ever do it.
CCR.fact: While their musical style is Louisiana Swamp Rock, the band members are from California.

BOP.name: Birds of Paradise
BOP.description: The favourite of my plant collection, a beautiful addition to my living room.
BOP.fact: The flower resembles a bird, and symbolizes ultimate freedom.
